document_data.name: Gustyl
document_data.deathnotes: <ref group="note">Died "three years ago" when the date was 1374 DR.
document_data.mainbody: Loremaster '''Gustyl "the Curious"''' was a priest of [[Oghma]]. He took on [[Raegar Stoneblade]] to unofficially work for him, spying on [[wizard]]s in [[Waterdeep]], although he forbade Raegar from spying on [[Maaril the Dragonmage]], or anyone from the [[Wands]] clan or [[Blackstaff Tower]]. Gustly's assistant was [[Phanar Manthar]]. Gustyl died suddenly in [[1371 DR]].
